definitions.definition: to observe; to abide by; to follow; to comply

parsedExamples.example: 遵守媽媽的叮嚀 / 遵守妈妈的叮咛  ―  zūnshǒu māma de dīngníng  ―  to follow mum's advice
遵守法紀 / 遵守法纪  ―  zūnshǒu fǎjì  ―  to abide by the law and observe discipline
遵守停火  ―  zūnshǒu tínghuǒ  ―  to observe a ceasefire
遵守規定 / 遵守规定  ―  zūnshǒu guīdìng  ―  to comply with regulations
請遵守場內秩序。 / 请遵守场内秩序。  ―  Qǐng zūnshǒu chǎng nèi zhìxù.  ―  Please keep order.
